title: Linguine With Italian Tuna and White Beans
directions: Cook pasta as directed on package; drain and rinse under cold water. Drain tuna, reserving oil in a salad bowl; whisk juice, garlic, salt and pepper with oil. Flake tuna into same bowl. Add pasta, beans, onion and chopped parsley; toss gently to coat with dressing. Serve garnished with parsley leaves and lemon slices, if desired.
ingredients: 8ounces canned Italian tuna packed in oil
1 can (15 oz) cannellini beans, rinsed and drained
1/2cup chopped Italian leaf parsley, plus whole leaves for garnish
